challenges.title: Coding is Typing
description: A coder or developer spends a lot of time typing.
It is important that you become a proficient typist.
Key combinations for common actions are called 'shortcuts', like Ctrl and C for copy, and very important to learn and use.
We will give you a list of the shortcuts you should learn as a minimum, but get creative, the more shortcuts you know the funner coding will become.

challenges.title: Coding is Reading
description: Everyday a coder searches for definitions in documentation.
Reading is a daily activity and a big part of coding. All the information could never be memorized.
It is critical to know where to find the definitions and then look them up every time you have a doubt.

challenges.title: Coding is Organizing
description: A great coder is a great organizer.
Categorizing and naming are key to being an excellent coder.
Staying organized will make coding very enjoyable over time. Disorganization leads to frustration.
Being organized helps a coder build a library of knowledge for himself and others.

challenges.title: Coding is Learning
description: The learning process never ends for a coder.
A coder learns something new everyday and is constantly learning new technology, solutions, and tools.
A coder should always be reading documentation, examples, tutorials, blogs and technical books on relevant topics.
A coder should also be watching videos of tutorials, examples, conference talks and other educational material.

challenges.title: Coding is Art
description: There is great skill and artistry in coding.
The art is in the code. How well written and organized, how simply each solution is defined, even how the text of code flows on the screen.
It is important to take time to build beauty in the code itself.

challenges.title: Coding is Fun
description: Achieving beautiful solutions to problems can be very fun.
Seeing your app come to life before your eyes is exciting.
Watching other coders look at your code and being impressed as well as users using your app is extremely rewarding.
